name: GCP VM instance has risky basic role assigned
description:
GCP VM instances with overly permissive 'basic' roles assigned present a significant security risk. These roles grant extensive project-wide access, increasing the impact of a compromise.

The 'basic' roles, legacy permissions predating granular IAM controls, offer broad access. A compromised Virtual Machine with a 'basic' role could enable attackers to escalate privileges across the entire project, leading to data breaches, unauthorized resource modification, or complete account takeover.

Exploiting this misconfiguration could result in a severe data breach, service disruption, or full project compromise. Using the principle of least privilege, assigning only necessary permissions, significantly reduces the attack surface and limits potential damage from a compromised Virtual Machine.

To remediate this, replace 'basic' roles with fine-grained IAM roles granting only the required permissions for each Virtual Machine. Regularly review assigned roles, removing unnecessary access to maintain a strong security posture. Employ automated monitoring and alerting for unexpected role assignments.
searchModel.query: config from cloud.resource where api.name = 'gcloud-projects-get-iam-user' AND json.rule = roles[*] contains "roles/editor" or roles[*] contains "roles/owner" as X; config from cloud.resource where api.name = 'gcloud-compute-instances-list' AND json.rule = status equals RUNNING and name does not start with "gke-" as Y; filter '$.Y.serviceAccounts[*].email contains $.X.user'; show Y;
recommendation:
It is recommended to the principle of least privilege for granting access.

To create a new instance with desired service account, please refer to the URL given below:
https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/access/create-enable-service-accounts-for-instances#using

To update the assigned service account to VM, please refer to the URL given below:
https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/access/create-enable-service-accounts-for-instances#changeserviceaccountandscopes

To update priviledges granted to a service account, please refer to the URL given below:
https://cloud.google.com/iam/docs/granting-changing-revoking-access
